content:
So, there's 2 things to take to vocab this week:
- ExpansionProfile flags also being documented as flags to the $expand operation itself, where they override the expanion profile flags
- definition of the heirarchyMeaning element, and addiition of a ballot note about the potential broadening of their meaning
We have a pretty long list of items to discuss - and there are a few new ones. I can see if there are some that we could do in a block (smaller than the last one) and prioritize some of the others.
